anime.name: Savanna Game
anime.info: One day a young boy, Kazuya Shibuya, receives an anonymous email asking if he wanted join the Savannah Game. The message is an invitation to a state-sanctioned killing game — a deadly role-playing game designed to motivate the inhibited youth of modern Japan. Shibuya and his two friends Kotegawa and Kudou find themselves in bizarre battles that span the space-time continuum, with everything from dragons to the Shinsengumi force of the shogunate era.
